name: Web Development
description: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks to build interactive websites.

name: Data Structures & Algorithms
description: Master problem-solving skills and coding interview preparation with DSA.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Explore AI concepts including search, logic, and intelligent systems.

name: Machine Learning
description: Learn supervised, unsupervised, and deep learning algorithms with practical projects.

description: Develop native and cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter, React Native, and more.

name: DevOps
